content:
From: Gerwin Klein <Gerwin.Klein@nicta.com.au>
The official status is: afp-2016 is now forked and preparing for release.

Any new changes to afp-devel will stay on afp-devel by default and it is fine to move on with isabelle-dev.

Everything Iâ€™m aware of on afp-2016 is concluded, but if anyone still has change sets that really need to move over to afp-2016, please let me know.

Cheers,
Gerwin
